name: TerraTower
description:
This is my submission for the 3rd Vaultacular Game Jam. 

This game combines an in depth terrain manipulation system with tower defense mechanics. There's many exiting features:

  • modify the shape of the terrain
  • modify the look of the terrain
  • place structures on your terrain
  • save/ load your terrains
  • participate in large battles
  • dynamic sound
  • a cool isometric 3d artstyle

controls:

  • hold right click to pan
  • r to rotate
  • scroll to zoom
  • esc for menu

to play the game simply unzip the downloaded file and run TerraTower.exe
